category: news
title: "IBM appoints NEXTGEN and Arrow Electronics as distributors"
excerpt: "IBM Australia has added CRN Impact Awards winner NEXTGEN Group and Arrow Electronics to its stable of value-added distributors, while also expanding its distribution footprint with Melbourne’s Meier Business Systems Systems. NEXTGEN and Arrow will work across IBM’s software, hardware, technology lifecycles services and cloud products."
